definition: the act of scuffing (scraping or dragging the feet), poke at with the foot or toe
details:
noun
- the act of scuffing (scraping or dragging the feet)
- a slipper that has no fitting around the heel
= synonyms: mule
verb
- poke at with the foot or toe
- mar by scuffing
= example: mar by scuffing
- get or become scuffed
= example: get or become scuffed
- walk without lifting the feet
= synonyms: drag
